name: hidradenoma
definition: A sweat gland neoplasm that is located_in an apical sweat gland. [url:https\://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hidradenoma]

clinicalTrials.title: Talimogene Laherparepvec and Nivolumab in Treating Patients With Refractory Lymphomas or Advanced or Refractory Non-melanoma Skin Cancers
